name: market for pulverised lignite | pulverised lignite | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7540/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'pulverised lignite', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;pulverised lignite' is a fossil fuel with a calorific value of 8.8 MJ/kg. It is used as a solid fuel and is produced by pulverising lignite. Its mainly processed further for use.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'pulverised lignite',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'pulverised lignite',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products
